short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print Loyverse as's receipt as an invoice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Linvoice is a Chrome extension for the Loyverse dashboard that enables users to print A4-sized invoices by adding a print invoice option to the top-right menu on the receipt details page.

 Currently, we only support the following languages: 
• English
• Español
• Français
• Português
• 中文 (简体)
• 中文 (繁體)
• العربية
• Nederlands
• Deutsch
• ภาษาไทย

To change the receipt language to one of the supported languages, please go to your Loyverse dashboard and navigate to Settings ⇾ Receipt⇾ Receipt Language. Then select one of the supported languages.

If you believe your language should be supported, please contact us at contact@sidati.com.

P.S. If you change any of the receipt parameters, please note that the changes will only be applied after reloading the page.
